DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether osteopathic manipulative treatment ( OMT ) : - decrease pain improves physical function woman third trim pregnancy - decrease complication obstetrical delivery - improve quality life post-partum period
DOC.brief_title: Study Effectiveness Osteopathic Manipulative Treatment Pregnant Women
DOC.detailed_description: Women experience multiple change anatomy physiology pregnancy may cause pain adversely affect quality life . Additionally , ten percent woman experience sign symptoms pre-eclampsia pre-term labor first pregnancy . Preliminary study osteopathic manipulative treatment ( OMT ) demonstrate decrease pain pregnancy , although mechanisms responsible effect unclear . Another theory osteopathic manipulative treatment ( OMT ) may help normalize sympathetic outflow , thereby minimize pregnancy complication . A recently publish retrospective study also suggest pregnant woman receive osteopathic manipulative treatment ( OMT ) may lower risk pre-term delivery presence meconium delivery .
DOC.criteria: Third trimester pregnancy High risk pregnancy Previous use chiropractic manipulation , osteopathic manipulative treatment ( OMT ) , physical therapy , therapeutic ultrasound current pregnancy
